page.title: 19SERVICES IN KILWINNING
page.content: KILWINNING IS IN CUNNINGHAME DISTRICT and STRATHCLYDE REGION .{REGIONAL {COUNCILLORS}are elected to represent their area on {STRATHCLYDE REGIONAL {COUNCIL.}DISTRICT COUNCILLORS represent the people living in their district on the DISTRICT COUNCIL (meetings in IRVINE). The police have a shop in KILWINNING,open part-time. They operate from Irvine but will take calls during office hours.The important matters are referred to the Area headquarters in KILMARNOCK. The courts for small crimes are held in IRVINE. There is one fire station with two fire-engines,employing 5-6 men to an engine.Social work offices,a job centre,are conveniently situated. Cleansing, postal ,medical and health,and telecommunications are well provided.
